message.content:
cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.RO

This paper deals with human action analysis and understanding in videos, which is a problem in computer vision. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also proposes a novel action reasoning framework that uses prior knowledge and deep learning approaches, which falls under the category of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The use of deep learning also suggests the category of machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also involves natural language processing techniques to explain the action reasoning, which falls under the category of computational linguistics (cs.CL). Finally, the paper involves tracking objects across frames, which is a problem in robotics (cs.RO).
